page.title: 07BOURNE END Jr SPORTS CLUB
page.content: In 1970,some parents allowed a group of children to use their swimming pool. Other interested parents started helping teach the children sports.As numbers increased,parents realized a need for a hall.Now there are at least 500 members and about 50 more on the waiting list of each section.Members range between 7-18 years and may attend the following sections:Drama,jogging, judo,swimming,netball,tennis,table tennis,football and badminton.The hall provides room for 3 badminton courts, plus spacious changing rooms,and a spectator balcony.It was eventually built in 1981 and opened by H.R.H Princess Anne in 1982.It is open on weekday evenings for members and can be hired for other occasions. At a yearly prize giving ceremony,members receive recognition of their ability.
